subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Milwaukee’s Michael Redd scored 57 points to break Kareem Abdul-Jabbar’s franchise record, but Matt Harpring made a layup with 1.8 seconds left as the visiting Utah Jazz defeated the Bucks.
snippet: Milwaukee’s Michael Redd scored 57 points to break Kareem Abdul-Jabbar’s franchise record, but Matt Harpring made a layup with 1.8 seconds left as the visiting Utah Jazz defeated the Bucks.
